title: Language Education Design Workshop Based on the Seven-Stage Instructional Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and understanding of educational activities
context.additional_context: Capacity-building course for designing language education in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing learner collaboration and production of practical real-life project outcomes

learning_goals: Systematically design language curricula using a 7-stage instructional design model
Apply criteria to evaluate alignment between educational objectives and learning activities
Complete a project designing learner feedback systems using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
